name: Personalized_travel_planning
desc: Personalized Travel Planning using Machine Learning is a smart recommendation system that analyzes user preferences, budget, and travel history to generate tailored itineraries.

name: Tic Tac Toe Game
desc: A classic Tic Tac Toe game built with a clean interface and smooth gameplay. Players take turns marking Xs and Os on a 3Ã—3 grid, with the goal of aligning three in a row. The project demonstrates fundamental programming concepts such as game logic, condition checking, and user interaction.
